channel.title: Networking on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Dan Aukes

item.title: Intricacies of working with two virtual machine clones
item.description: Even if you have two vm clones with different mac addresses, you need to tell ubuntu how exactly the machine identifies itself on the network for the two clones to get separate ip addresses.

item.title: Measuring Speed Between Computers
item.description: sudo apt install -y iperf computer 1: iperf -s Computer 2:

item.title: Simple Netplan Config
item.description: Example update enp0s3 to match your ethernet interface update ip4 address to match an available address

item.title: Tailscale Details
item.description: from here about exit nodes and subnets IP Forwarding echo 'net.
